title: window too small to see anything
body: after i have found a game and the game is transitioning it opens the window back up but its too small help plz.

replies.body:
Change your screen resolution.
Make sure full screen is enabled.
1280x800 at least depending on your monitor size.

It's possible that your camera is zoomed in whenever the game starts. Let's check that off first by trying to scroll down while in the game to zoom out more. 

If that's not the case, there could be something wrong with your configuration files. We can try resetting those in a custom game by following [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761934#wq2).

Let me know if you're still having issues with your window size!
